988360.name: Great Hero's Beard Soundtrack
988360.description:
Great Hero's Beard音乐包lei了！

本游戏的所有配乐由OneShark的 画师兼音乐家完成！ 格式为MP3.

01 - Dreamland
02 - Alpha Slime
03 - Topsy Turby
04 - March of The Pillagers
05 - The Fat Lady Sings
06 - Aquapixel
07 - Under Preassure
08 - Witch's Holiday
09 - Journey
10 - Final Showdown
11 - Obsessive & Compulsive Ghosts
12 - He Has Been Awoken
13 - Everything Is Lost
14 - Final Flight
15 - In Search of the Unattainable
16 - When The Snow Settles
17 - Winter Forever
988360.supported_languages: 英语, 繁体中文, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 日语, 泰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 简体中文, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
